text: was a Japanese singer and actress. She was born in Saku, Japan. Her career began in 1985.https://www.bangkokpost.com/life/social-and- lifestyle/2916982/remembering-j-pop-star-miporin-found-dead-at-54?tbref=hp. Retrieved 2024-12-10 Nakayama released her debut single, "C" around the same time she appeared in her first movie Be-Bop High School. She became one of the most popular idols during its "Golden Age" in the 1980s. Her role in the 1985 drama Maido Osawagase Shimasu made her popular. Her best known songs were "Waku Waku Sasete", "50/50", "Catch Me" and "You're My Only Shinin' Star". She also starred in Love Letter (1995). Nakayama was found dead in her home in Tokyo, Japan on 6 December 2024 at the age of 54. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Japanese stage actors Category:Actors from Tokyo Category:Singers from Tokyo Category:People from Nagano Prefecture
title: Miho Nakayama
